0: A stowaway has fallen to his death after clinging to the bottom of a British Airways jet as it flew over London. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The man is believed to have plunged from the aircraft and on to the offices of a clothes business in Richmond, south-west London. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A second man is in a serious condition in hospital after being found unconscious at Heathrow. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The pair are said to have held onto the plane as it flew more than 8,000 miles from Johannesburg in South Africa to Heathrow.
